email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider something in the mid-40s? Also, what’s the laycan for this vessel? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.75 per ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. The laycan is October 20-25. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.75 sounds reasonable. However, we’d need a firm laycan of October 22-24 to align with our loading schedule. Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and we can secure the laycan for October 22-24. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. If this works for you, I’ll draft the fixture recap. Let me know. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Please proceed with the fixture recap at $48.75 per ton and the agreed laycan and demurrage terms. Thanks for your help on this. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve attached the fixture recap for your review. Please confirm once you’ve checked the details. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best regards, Sarah
